sentences.en: Exports of Australian wine are growing at a phenomenal rate.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚葡萄酒出口正在以惊人的速度增长。

sentences.en: Harvard was a phenomenal experience for me . Academic life was fascinating.
sentences.cn: 对我,哈佛的求学经历是一段非凡的经历.

sentences.en: Harvard was just a phenomenal experience for me . Academic life was fascinating.
sentences.cn: 对我来说--哈佛的求学经历是一段非凡的经历.

sentences.en: He has learned a phenomenal amount in the last two years.
sentences.cn: 过去的两年中他学到了许多东西。
他是个非凡的赛跑选手.

sentences.en: It is not quite as phenomenal as some people have urged.
sentences.cn: 它不象某些人极力宣扬的那么出众.

sentences.en: My arrival resulted in a phenomenal increase of the foreign population of Pao An.
sentences.cn: 我到后,保安外侨的人数顿然剧增.

sentences.en: Pat Cash used a phenomenal service game to whip Lendl in straight sets.
sentences.cn: 帕特·卡什以超群的发球高招,直落三局击败了伦德尔.

sentences.en: Rose's strong point is her phenomenal memory for dates.
sentences.cn: 罗斯的特点是对日期的记忆力很强.

sentences.en: Sim did a phenomenal job presenting the heartless, miserly, self - centered Scrooge.
sentences.cn: 他成功地演绎了这个无情 、 吝啬 、 自我 中心的主人翁.

sentences.en: The explanatory gap derives from the special character of phenomenal concepts.
sentences.cn: QEG是从现象概念的特殊特征中产生的.

sentences.en: The performances have been absolutely phenomenal.
The phenomenal growth that has enabled Matsushita to rank so highly.
sentences.cn: 松下公司非凡的发展速度,使它名列前茅.

sentences.en: the phenomenal success of computer games in recent years
sentences.cn: 近年来电脑游戏的惊人成功

sentences.en: The product has been a phenomenal success.
sentences.cn: 这一产品获得了极大的成功。

sentences.en: To do it well requires a phenomenal amount of commitment.
sentences.cn: 把它做好需要投入很多.

words.tran_cn: 现象上地；明白地；从感官认识到

trans.tran_cn: 现象的，显著的，异常的，能知觉的，非凡的，惊人的
